name: Last Knight Leaves
description:
You are knight without equipment, only one arrow and desire for revenge. 

Moved: WASD, aim via mouse, shoot - left mouse button. 

This is my first finished game for jam. 

Week was hard, but funny. 

At start I wanted to create procedureal generated dungeon, but then realized that not enought time. So there are only generated cave with rooms templates. 

Also I'm solo developer, so there are a lot of borrowed assets (all credits in game) and bugs (not borrowed, it's mine hehe). 

ASSETS:

https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck

https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

https://codemanu.itch.io/pixelart-effect-pack

Feedbacks are welcome
